ca.ualberta.cs.technologic

Class Computer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.technologic.Computer

  • public class Computer
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by gknoblau on 2016-02-06. I added a status variable that can only be Available, Bidded or Borrowed- Jordan
